alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:29AM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buffalo and southern Sherman Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 329 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Litchfield, or 28 miles north of Kearney, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hazard around 340 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Ravenna, Poole and Rockville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings.
